sentences.en: He bellowed in a stentorian voice.
sentences.cn: 他用洪亮的声音大声喊叫。

sentences.en: Now all joined in solemn stentorian accord.
sentences.cn: 现在,在这庄严的,响彻云霄的和声中大家都联合在一起了.

sentences.en: Speak softly; you don't need a stentorian voice to be heard in this small room.
sentences.cn: 说话轻柔点; 在这小房间里你不需要这么大声被人听见.

sentences.en: Stentorian snores came from the shadows - Chen Yueh - ngo's elder brother, a stevedore.
sentences.cn: 昏暗中有鼾声如雷,那是陈月娥的当码头工人的哥哥.

sentences.en: The stentorian tones of auctioneer, calling out to clear , now announced that the sale to commence.
sentences.cn: 拍卖人用洪亮的声音招呼大家闪开一点, 然后宣布拍卖即将开始.

words.tran_cn: 声音洪亮的人；喇叭虫属

trans.tran_en: a stentorian voice is very loud and powerful
